title: Pavel Soukup is a researcher at the Centre for Medieval Studies, Institute of Philosophy, Czech Academy of Sciences in Prague, Czech Republic. His research interests revolve around late medieval religious literature, heresy, and crusading in Central Europe. His book publications include a monograph on reform preaching in late medieval Bohemia
